message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a unique item at a competitive price. My initial offer is $18000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I believe this product is worth more than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. My counteroffer is $16000.

I understand you're trying to get closer to your minimum price, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $15500. I'm trying to be reasonable, but I need to stay within my budget.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob. However, I still need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get at least $16500. My counteroffer is $16500.

I understand you're trying to get closer to your minimum price, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make a final counteroffer of $15000. I've gone as high as I can, and I really need to stay within my budget.
